title: Consolidation State Component
description: Tracks the temporal consolidation state of a Motif or Filament.

consolidation_level.description: The current level of temporal consolidation.

last_consolidated_at.description: The timestamp of the last consolidation event.

next_consolidation_due.description: The timestamp when this entity is eligible for the next level of consolidation.

source_entity_count.description: The number of lower-level entities that were consolidated into this one.
